Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. With its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, it's designed to meet your specific needs. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I'm extending this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $99. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I believe this product could significantly improve your life, and I'd be thrilled if you choose to make it a part of yours. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
